thread.title: Great place to stay in Manhattan
thread.title_full: Great place to stay in Manhattan - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chun L
title: Great place to stay in Manhattan
text: This is the second Even Hotel for me. In fact it was by mistake, mixed up with the one in midtown. Still I am happy about it. The gym is as nice as the other place. In fact , the location is different, but one can argue to be better. Really enjoy it. Hope they have it in more cities.
